variable.name: STUDY
variable.description: HeartGO cohort (ARIC, CARDIA, CHS, FHS, JHS, MESA)

variable.name: ESP_STUDY_SITE
variable.description: Clinic or field center within cohort

variable.name: ESP_PHENOTYPE
variable.description: EOMI_Case; EOMI_Control; LDL_High; LDL_Low; Stroke; BP_High; BP_Low; DPR

variable.name: ESP_AGE_AT_MI
variable.description: Age at incident MI. For HeartGO, this is only filled in (i.e. non-missing) for those with adjudicated MI that occurred during the study. It is missing for those that are censored.

variable.name: ESP_FRS_CHDPROB
variable.description: Framingham Risk Score predicted prob. (only calcultated in HeartGO for those with no baseline or incident MI)

variable.name: ESP_LDL
variable.description: Baseline calculated LDL in mg/dL (missing where trigs>400)

variable.name: ESP_AGE_AT_LDL
variable.description: Age in years at baseline LDL

variable.name: ESP_LDL_UNTREATED
variable.description: Estimated untreated LDL (In HeartGO, it is currently baseline LDL divided by 0.75 for those on lipid lowering meds)

variable.name: ESP_LIPID_MED
variable.description: Any lipid lower med at baseline

variable.name: ESP_AGE_AT_LAST_FU
variable.description: Age at last follow-up for MI (missing for anyone with a baseline or incident MI)
